greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 1, a(lucky(n)) = oddprime(a(n-1)), a(unlucky(n)) = not_an_oddprime(1+a(n)).
comment: Here lucky(n) = n-th lucky number = A000959(n), unlucky(n) = n-th unlucky number = A050505(n), oddprime(n) = n-th odd prime = A065091(n), not_an_oddprime(n) = n-th natural number which is not an odd prime = A065090(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: As a composition of other permutations:
xref: Related or similar permutations: A257725, A257728, A257729, A257732.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 09 2015
